{3}{U}{U}: Diverge 4/4 [i](If this creature isn’t a Mutant, its base power and toughness become 4/4 and it becomes a Mutant in addition to its other types. Diverge only as a sorcery.)[/i]
When Sightless Shambler diverges, exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. Copy that card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.
